_comment: English translations for Java Cheat Code

java.description: Java is a class-based, object-oriented programming language designed for portability and cross-platform development.

比較.title: Comparison
比較.description: Reference vs value comparison, case-insensitive matching

操作.title: Manipulation
操作.code:
String str = "Abcd";

str.toUpperCase();     // ABCD
str.toLowerCase();     // abcd
str.concat("#");       // Abcd#
str.replace("b", "-"); // A-cd
"  abc ".trim();      // abc

情報取得.title: Information Retrieval
情報取得.description: Character and substring extraction with search functionality
情報取得.code:
String str = "Abcd";

str.charAt(2);        // c
str.indexOf("a");     // -1 (not found)
str.indexOf("A");     // 0
str.length();         // 4
str.substring(2);     // cd
str.substring(2, 3);  // c
str.contains("c");    // true
str.endsWith("d");    // true
str.startsWith("A"); // true
str.isEmpty();        // false

Mathメソッド.title: Math Methods
Mathメソッド.code:
Math.max(5, 10);        // 10
Math.min(5, 10);        // 5
Math.abs(-4.7);         // 4.7
Math.sqrt(64);          // 8.0
Math.pow(2, 3);         // 8.0
Math.round(4.6);        // 5
Math.ceil(4.3);         // 5.0
Math.floor(4.7);        // 4.0
